About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Hello, my name is Victoire and I am in my 2nd year at IMT Atlantique (Nantes, France). I'm in a software engineering degree program and I'm also in a work-study program (half of the time at school, and the other half in a company).

I have not always studied computer science. Before that I studied mechanical engineering and I also did a year in architecture school. After these 4 years, I had the opportunity to take a gap year to think about my future. That's how I ended up in a DUT (a 2-year degree) in computer sciences.

MY WORK EXPERIENCE IN COMPUTER SCIENCES

UbiSolutions

Android Developper

First job in the sector of computer sciences, it was an apprenticeship while my Computer Sciences 2-year degree. I developped Android application on mobile devices.

DGFIP

Vue.JS Developer & Data Analyst
